Please see this mail from you -> me that includes your comments that I replied to.
Specifically, please see your bullet below that is labeled "Participants." From you to me.
- Participants: Everyone who was an actual witness to the event that night- That includes: Adrain- saw, Dad- saw, and Mom- heard AD's reaction and
immediate concerns.
I realize we were discussing the value of Elsa with her limited information and non-participation in this but we were still going back and forth. We set
a time to work on it and you bailed.
I am happy to repeat my concerns again if I need to, but I offered an alternative plan. And at the end of the day, the Participants list that came FROM
YOU did not include Elsa. Period.
So while we might have been misaligned, I went with what you said. You can say "not cool" but I asked repeatedly if we were aligned so this DID
NOT happen. Blaming me is "not cool"

Message 1225 of 4024
Before I say something super mean, I'm going to stop.
I replied to the email where you said Elsa would not be a participant. I thought we had aligned. And given we are five working hours before they chat,
I think I was pretty clear that we needed urgency now (see subject line.) When did you plan to align if we were not already? We tried that last night.
Happy to chat more, but for now I will remain positive and constructive as promised. I did nothing in my mind that was either nefarious or meant ill-
intent. I am trying my best on all fronts to help even as I am a child abuser to the courts likely to do it again. Not sure what you were expecting.

She does have a perspective. Based on a non-witness, non parent, and limited information. Remember she screamed at me for never apologizing to
you. I sent my apology three weeks ago. Is she qualified to give her opinion when she has no idea what the heck is going on?
I'll note that she also laid into me about screwing other women when we were married. She has no idea that started when you were 18 in Hong Kong,
we both participated and enjoyed it, but she only knows your side. Then there is her take on Kevin Otero and what you two did together.
I trust Elsa to make smart decisions and contribute constructively. She just needs the full and accurate picture. Otherwise, she will jump to incorrect
conclusions and be very opinionated. That feels like a commonsense requirement to provide testimony. How else would she be helpful?

Not trying to fight, just confirming.
BTW- you know that forcing us to go through them for every little nit is a conflict of interest right? She stays in the middle of our business. You are
like a child with a big piggy bank.
Don't you ever want to try and get this back on the rails or did she convince you that is the wrong path for the mental health and wellbeing of our
family? It is not normal or healthy.
These are not the discussions we have had all week of cooperation, Just go back and look.

Message 1236 of 4024
BTW- so that you know what was already signed vs what you think you are proposing as some compromise is noted below.
No offense but I have no idea how you and she almost always seem to be wrong on what is really said or singed vs what you think.
Is there any way I can help you? I feel like copy and pasting the truth back to you feels condescending and that is not my intent.
Your RO:
The Restrained Person may not text, email, or telephone the Protected Person EXCEPT as
specifically permitted herein. The parties may communicate via the Our Family Wizard
application, and the Restrained Person will communicate with the Protected Person solely for the
purpose of co-parenting the parties’ children and/or for communicating regarding management ofshared assets. The parties may also communicate
via email with third parties included to facilitate business concerning their minor children and/or managing the parties’ shared assets.
What you will consider:
OFW to add management of shared assets <<See above. It's already there>>
E-mails with 3rd parties, for co parenting and management of shared assets. <<See above. It's already there>>
The credible physical threat stands and applies for me. <<See RO. It's still there>>

If you were going to file the right, RO, please, let’s consider the list that I sent. If you disagree with any of them or don’t think that they will make
problem-solving easier, please let me know.
This is all with the best intentions in mind Christine so we can work better together. I promise you, I’m not gonna fuck this up. Just like I said all
week, I’m all in.
I guess I just don’t understand why you’re going back on everything you said ????

Message 1242 of 4024
All week, every day, you asked me to help out and offer suggestions, give you guidance on what will make things better for us, whether it was the
SAAS application, the RO, the court order, or the Dr. Brown engagement.
You also gave me your expectations for a return to normalcy. I thanked you, complied and I’ve really enjoyed working as a team. you also asked me to
show patience, assuring me that you would get back shortly to resolve.
For some reason that all blew up tonight. It feels like Annalisa is the puppet master. She did not even file the right RO that was discussed with Lisa. It’
s super frustrating.to have her as the go between. WTF?
Sent:02/08/2024 at 07:59 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/08/2024 at 09:10 PM)
Subject:Super Frustrated

I want to be able to take you at your word and understand when we are working together. Not have the rug pulled out from under me at the last
minute with no discussion at all (as promised)
I’m trying to say this in the most peaceful way, consistent with what we agreed to. But it’s very frustrating, Christine. Please don’t teach a bad lesson
about trust and patience.
This definitely won’t be the road back to any kind of normalcy. Let me know what you think. I am still going to cling to the hope that we can do this.
Please exercise some control here.
Thanks
Message 1243 of 4024
I am in control Robert.
What I am slowly learning is to see things for how they really have been, and how what you pushed as normal behavior and how I was treated, your
actions, was so wildly inappropriate.
The continued attempts to manipulate and control me, by shaming me, or stating things as fact when they are grossly untrue, its just shocking.
The e-mail about Elsa, and attempts to portray your numerous infidelities as something that I endorsed or condoned....
So the correct RO will be filed, and I will not let you to continue to shame, humiliate me, control or manipulate me into doing what you want.

From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/08/2024 at 09:50 PM)
Subject:Re: Super Frustrated

Ok, Christine. You lied to me all week. That’s manipulation

From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/09/2024 at 07:10 AM)
Subject:Re: Super Frustrated
Message 1245 of 4024
And your perspective is so odd to me. Go back and read what you wrote. How are things “really” . I did just as you asked me to do to start being a
healthy coparent with you. Not manipulate you.
“Please tell Lisa to send an email to Anna Lisa”
“I am open to your suggestions, please share”
But after I do exactly as you asked, I am a manipulator. I don’t get that. How is that true?
I thought it was teamwork. I thought I was being helpful. I was doing as I was asked. And I know you won’t read what you wrote. It doesn’t fit your
Sent:02/08/2024 at 10:10 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/09/2024 at 07:10 AM)
Subject:Re: Super Frustrated

narrative. So you will ignore it.
And if you are in control, why was the wrong RO filed?
You did that? So now we have actually been violating it on both sides all week. We can’t even do an “fyi” forward. We both broke the RO now. Zero
1-1’s
And why are you offering up something I have already signed. How does that make any sense. I already signed it. Thats being in control?
And you have zero idea about the discussion with Elsa. You have no clue what she said. About our swinging or what she told me about you and
Kevin.
I’m going to stop. I promised to be helpful, not attack even in the face of accusations and insults. I am really trying, Christine. I’m not going to stop.
Please consider I listened to you. I don’t know why you started hating on me tonight, all I know is you spoke with the person who can’t file the right
RO.
Can we please go back to working towards a common goal and quit trying so hard to destroy me? I honestly loved you more than life itself. And I’m
trying.
Message 1246 of 4024
You know I went back and read what I’ve been saying to you over the last few days. I looked at my tone. I looked at my cooperation, and I looked to
see if I was manipulating you.
I honestly hope you will take a moment and just review some of the things that I was trying to do. I hope that you’ll step back and look objectively at
our communications.
I know you see me as some sort of evil villain, but I’m not, I don’t know why you interpret everything I do is some plot to abuse you. that is not my
intent at all in this relationship
I’m honestly and sincerely trying to listen to you while you are still my wife and be the man you are telling me I need to be for you. I’m doing this for
our children and our mental health.
I’ve been saying since July, just tell me what I did wrong. You don’t have to hate me so much, Christine I am not doing anything with malice or hate
towards you. Please see our threads.
I’m at a loss now on how to behave or what you want from me. It feels like nothing I do is right, no matter how hard I try. I don’t know why you can’
t see that. I’m just honestly so confused.
I would like to keep trying

ask a favor.
My offer still stands. The place may be a bit cluttered as I was not planning on it. But I promise we’ll have an attractive set up with a nice background.

It really does reflect better on us as a family. And if there are any yellow flags later, they won’t look back on it and think “ yeah now that I think about
it, they were kinda weird, I wonder if their home life is the real issue”
Let’s just be civil for a good cause. It’s good all around.

Message 1251 of 4024
If you think that I am trying to manipulate you I want to be transparent. Yes! I want to find a great cause that will help Adrian. AND give you and me
one ever so small victory where we can reflect that we worked together. As a team to do something good.
As soon as you shared the questions, I wrote back immediately and said I would do it. I had it done in an hour, and I thought it was pretty good.
Sent:02/09/2024 at 10:46 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/09/2024 at 10:48 AM)
Subject:Re: AD’s SAAS Meeting

When it needed your updates, I did the same. I wanted to show you we could do something good together.
Please don’t find a reason not to do it.
Please provide a reason for us to partner.
It could make all the difference someday.
Message 1252 of 4024
I truly appreciate the speed and attention you made to the responses and questions. I input into the system as it was first requirement for the
preliminary application but I have been unable to submit it. I’m going to ask why on the call.
I hope you have seen me move forward in the other front for teacher evaluation and transcripts with similar urgency.
Agree that when we do partner together it can result in real synergies.
My hesitation is based on years of lived experience that I am only just unpacking. Anytime I would show or demonstrate a willingness to forgive,
move on, forget etc, it is rewarded briefly (days, weeks, sometimes months) with improved situation, but things have inevitably fallen back to
behaviors that have been traumatizing, scary, disrespectful etc. often times my accepting behavior is then weaponized against me in the most
humiliating or embarrassing way, to demonstrate my weakness or lack of judgment.
I fully expect this to happen in our mediation and future interactions, so I am in a position that I can’t respond in ways I used to. It does not serve me
well.
I don’t expect you to understand but that’s my explanation whether you accept or agree with it.
Sent:02/09/2024 at 10:57 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/09/2024 at 11:05 AM)
Subject:Re: AD’s SAAS Meeting
Message 1253 of 4024
I am not gonna fight your explanation. I realize I have a demonstrated track record. What I am asking you to please do for the sake of us. Moving
forward is to try one baby step in the right direction.
I can assure you there will be no trauma no ill will at all. it will be as I said an opportunity for you and I to celebrate something positive that we did
together. Changing the way that we were because I did not know about it. I was not aware of it. I am now.
I am trying to make the change, but if you do not give me an opportunity to show you that, it will never happen. And we are doomed to this life of
hating each other. This is one hour. Please give me the chance for one hour Christine.

I am fully committed to Adrian and his future.

I am only asking if per chance we could make a step in the right direction to be good coparents. The kids will know if we hate each other.
I understand that it’s not happening today. And I’m not gonna fight you on it. But please consider another opportunity in the future. Please give me

I just got it. Since it is not filed, can we at least make some basic changes? Even the stuff we are doing on email now is not allowed.
Someone always has to be on the mail for you and I to swap them. So we can’t just share basic information about our own kids.
And honestly, it would be better if we could have a running list format. We can start with something very small but effective.
It’s not going to get filed today anyway, so can we please consider it? It’s gonna cost a lot more money to make it right in the future.
I’m not gonna fuck this up, Christine. And please don’t take this as me trying to manipulate you. If you do just forget it.
Thanks
